titleStmt.title: Falsehood unmaskt in answer to a book called Truth unveil'd, which vainly pretends to justify the charge of Mr. Standish against some persons in the Church of England / by a dutiful son of that church.
titleStmt.author: Patrick, Simon, 1626-1707.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for James Magnes and Richard Bentley ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by Simon Patrick. Cf. Wing.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
